mapper.select: INSERT INTO inprog.users(authority_id, first_name, last_name, login, password, middle_name) VALUES (#{authority}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{login}, #{password}, #{middleName}) RETURNING user_id as id, first_name, last_name, middle_name, authority_id as authority, login

SELECT user_id as id, first_name, last_name, middle_name, authority_id as authority, login
FROM inprog.users WHERE user_id = #{id}

SELECT user_id first_name, last_name, middle_name, email, birth_date, authority_id
FROM inprog.users
mapper.update: update inprog.users set first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, middle_name = #{middleName}, email = #{email} where user_id = #{id}
